name: silly striped teddy
notes:
free knitting pattern from lion brand yarn.

pattern number: l40274
skill level: easy (level 2)
size: one size -- about 8 in. (20.5 cm) tall

materials:
• 865-204 lion brand vanna's palettes: charming (100% acrylic;
package size: 0.35oz/10.00 gr. (17yds/16m) pull skeins)
• knitting needles -- size 4 [3.5 mm]
• large-eye blunt darning needle
• fiberfill stuffing
• 2 black safety eyes, 9 mm

gauge:
exact gauge is not essential to this project.

colors of vanna's palettes:
eggplant (a)
sapphire (b)
rust (c)
brick (d)
dusty rose (e)
toffee (f)
espresso (g)
